#summary If you're me, then who the hell am I?!

= Hello World =

Mogaroo is for UW students who are trying to get into a class. Mogaroo's purpose is to continuously check for openings. When an opening is found, Mogaroo tries to get your attention. At some point, Mogaroo might even register for you.


= Details =

Mogaroo is:

* Usable

* Friendly

* Incomplete

* Needy

* Anorexic

* Inlactose tolerant
